itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, February 4, 2014
teaser: First up: Facebook celebrates ten years today. Later: With figures on manufacturing orders out today, we look at why the manufacturing sector is getting leaner and leaner after each recession. Though employment in manufacturing is inching back up, few expect it to return to pre-recession levels. And, Microsoft names its new CEO: Satya Nadella. We look at whether he will be up to the task, as well as the legacy of his predecessor, Steve Ballmer.
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, February 4, 2014
byline: Stacey Vanek Smith, David Brancaccio, Bruce Johnson, Sally Herships, David Weinberg, Chris Farrell, Queena Kim and Nancy Marshall-Genzer
